title: Dave Brailsford relinquishes Ineos Grenadiers’ role, with Manchester United now the priority
content:
End of an era as Team Sky co-founder steps away from team principal spot, but he will still exert influence.

Read the full article at Dave Brailsford relinquishes Ineos Grenadiers’ role, with Manchester United now the priority on Velo.
author: sstokes
